content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price of my newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg is €1,000 per month. I am open to negotiations, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the information, Mr. Schmidt. Despite the apartment's prime location, I humbly request to consider a lower price due to my student status. As a responsible and dependable individual, I would ensure timely rent payments. Could we perhaps explore a rental price closer to €850 Euros per month? I appreciate your time and consideration.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your understanding of the apartment's prime location and the amenities it offers. However, €850 per month is too low for this apartment. I am willing to consider €950 per month. Remember, the goal is to find a fair price that suits us both.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I acknowledge your perspective, Mr. Schmidt, and thank you for your flexibility. While €950 per month is somewhat above my initial expectation, I am leaning towards accepting it due to the apartment's favorable location. I agree to the price of 950 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
